text: 🚨 27% of adults face at least one healthcare affordability challenge 💸🤕 Low- and middle-income families are hit hardest, but the problem affects more and more people 💔 High out-of-pocket costs, medical debt, forgone care - the list goes on 🙅‍♂️ It's time for policymakers to take action and ensure everyone can access affordable healthcare 💪
